---
name: Note Improvement
about: Report discrepancies, problems or improvements for notes
title: "[<subject name>] - <really concise decription of the problem>"
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''

---

Describe the problem with the note, stating the subject name and where the fix can be applied (section or precise line numbers are fine).

Describe why it is a problem, optionally suggest one or more possible fixes.

If you want to fix the problem yourself, please, open a PR.
